channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Federal immigration agents will expand enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh, mayor says
item.description: Federal immigration authorities will expand their enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh. That’s according to the mayor of the state’s capital city, who says the expansion could come as soon as Tuesday.

item.title: The former Marine sniper accused of a mass shooting and the warning signs that came before
Group of South Carolina lawmakers look at the most restrictive abortion bill in the US
